title: 128: Bachelorette Breakdown & Friendship Breakups
itunes:title: 128: Bachelorette Breakdown & Friendship Breakups
description:
Today it’s just Bekah and Jess in the studio and they really dive into the reasons why they are excited about our new bachelorette, Clare Crawley! They also spill about some potential new recaps that will be coming! And then The Broads talk all about friendship breakups, the ones they have experienced, why they are so difficult, how to move forward (advise welcome!), some tips on making new friends after friend breakups and much more! 
INSTAGRAM:
Chatty Broads: https://www.instagram.com/chattybroads
Bekah: https://www.instagram.com/bekah (https://www.instagram.com/bekah/)
Jess: https://www.instagram.com/thebaddmom
